entry.title: It Really Worked Out
entry.summary:
Author: WaitASecondWhat

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,175Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 2

Summary: Chris and Allison move to a new town because Chris needs money. He starts working as a host at a restaurant, but to get more money he works at a vampire bar where he allows vampires to drink his blood for tips. Then he meets Peter, a vampire who just talks to him, not realizing it was Peter Hale until the coven, who Allison befriends at school, asks them. Peter expertly creates a cover that they have been dating. Can they keep this cover? Or will it ruin what they have?

entry.title: Our Road in Focus
entry.summary:
Author: simplyn2deep

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,431Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 24

Summary: It starts with two separate road trips and a thousand miles of sky between them: Derek driving west from New York with grief in his rearview, Stiles heading east, running on caffeine and restless hope after too many near misses in the FBI. Years later, their photos end up on the same walls, their lives in the same town again, and somehow the whole of Beacon Hills decides that if Derek and Stiles are going to spend all their time together taking pictures, they might as well make it official.

entry.title: The Truth Always Escapes
entry.summary:
Author: stereksterek

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,398Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 63

Summary: Derek sighed tiredly before taking a seat at the opposite end of the sofa and opening the book. “It looks at how pack members experience the bond based on what they are. Instincts and connections vary greatly from born werewolves, to bitten werewolves, banshees, hunters, and even humans.” Stiles paused, “That… actually sounds very interesting. I kinda wanna read it now. But my head feels like a warzone, and I definitely don’t have the energy to hold a book that heavy in my hands right now.” He twisted and hoisted his legs up onto the couch when he had an idea. “Maybe you could read it to me, Sourwolf? And who knows? Maybe hearing you say more than two sentences in a row might be enough to actually shock the sickness out of me?” ------------------------------------------------------------------Or the one where Stiles wakes up sick thinking his day can’t get any worse, but boy was he wrong…

entry.title: of all the gin joints
entry.summary:
Author: wishingonalightningbolt

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,266Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 191

Summary: “Dude!” Scott says. “Did you know Derek Hale is over there?!” Stiles laughs, nodding. “Yeah, Scotty, I noticed.” “You have to go say something! We have to go say something!” “Say what?” Stiles asks. “I see your 2014 hat trick against the Oilers in my dreams?” “That would be a good place to start,” Scott says. “You should tell him about the rookie card!” “So I can seem like a pathetic kid?” Stiles scoffs. “Yeah, great idea.” “I think it’s cute,” Kira tells him. “Very sweet.” “Sweet,” Lydia agrees, “but not sexy.” “Sexy?” Scott says, screwing up his face. “Why would we want to be sexy in front of Derek Hale?” -0- In which Derek is Stiles' hockey hero, and they end up in the same bar together one spring evening in 2017.

entry.title: the shape of being chosen
entry.summary:
Author: sourwolf97

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,246Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 90

Summary: Derek huffs, the softest hesitation of a laugh, warm against his skin. “You talk in your sleep,” he counters quietly. “A lot.” Panic flickers up his spine before Stiles can stop it. He forces his voice to stay light, easy. “It’s probably just my soul trying to escape my body,” he says. “Can’t blame it, really.” But inside, he’s scrolling through mental footage of every night he’s ever crashed here, cataloguing every murky, half-remembered dream, wondering what words might have slipped out when his guard was down. Did he say Derek’s name? Did he say I love you? Did he say don’t leave? Did he confess the whole pathetic thesis statement his brain has been footnoting for months now: I know this isn’t actually anything for you, and that’s fine, I’m fine, please just let me keep pretending until you get bored?

entry.title: Carry That Weight
entry.summary:
Author: sara_luckyj

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,941Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 94

Summary: Once the girl had left his room, after he had put every possible contact number, email, and address he could think of into her phone, he proceeded to get absolutely shit-faced all by himself on a bottle of berry Absolut someone had left in his mini fridge, drunk dialed Jackson, Greenberg, and Coach Finstock purely to hang up on them and laugh into his pillow for no reason, and then he booked an earlier flight home for Thanksgiving. Stiles was going to need all the time possible to hash things out with his dad, and to cry himself out on Scotty's shoulder. He was going to be a dad."Holy Mary Mother of God," he said, channelling the Goonies. "Someone needs to stop me." Stiles gets a girl pregnant, keeps the baby, learns what a nasal aspirator is, and gets the guy. All in a year's work.

entry.title: Copain of the black wolf.
entry.summary:
Author: EverythingRara

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 215,440Chapters: 26/40Kudos: 1,016

Summary: A Sterek rewrite of the show, that stays mostly canon compliant in the beginning, shown exclusively through the eyes of Stiles Stilinski, unknown soul mate of Derek Hale.Starts slow emotionally, my first attempt at a story of this degree please be gentle.Stiles grunted softly as he heaved himself onto the roof, his sneakers scuffing against the shingles. Scott—his best friend since forever—wasn’t answering his phone, and Stiles couldn’t wait. There was no way Scott was going to believe what Stiles had just overheard.Keeping low, Stiles crept along the roof toward Scott’s window, his heart racing as the cool night air pressed against his skin. He tried the window, but it wouldn’t budge—it was locked.“Of course it’s locked,” he muttered under his breath, rolling his eyes.Knocking softly on the glass, he leaned in closer, squinting to peer inside. The curtains were drawn, giving him only a hazy, distorted view of the room beyond. “Scott,” he hissed, rapping on the window again. No answer.Suddenly, the curtains shifted, and the window flung open. Scott and Stiles screamed, startling each other.

entry.title: Wolf Among Flowers
entry.summary:
Author: Dexterous_Sinistrous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,014Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 475

Summary: “Gerard wanted me to think you were cruel—crueler than him, actually.” Derek stood to his full height, taking a step closer to Stiles as he placed his thumb and forefinger against Stiles’ chin. He was gentle in his prompting—the gentlest he had been since the last time he had held Cora as a baby. “I would never make you hunt. I would never make you kill.” Stiles blinked, his mouth partially parting. But he didn’t know what to say. “I never wish that feeling on anyone,” Derek finally stated, dropping his hand from Stiles. ~*~ Or Beauty and the Beast vibes, also known as the one where scarred, battle weary Prince Derek Hale is married by proxy to the adorable, bookworm scholar Stiles Stilinski.

entry.title: A Very Merry Newtmas
entry.summary:
Author: Ruggy_21

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,063Chapters: 5/13Kudos: 19

Summary: “No Newt. We are not going to let anything happen to you again. This time we’ll be able to save you. And besides, life is kind of boring when you aren’t on some crazy, dangerous adventure every day.”Newt and Minho look at Thomas. He smiles.“Up to one last adventure?” Or, Remember that page? The one between page 249 and page 251? What if I told you that the events from that page didn’t play out exactly how you thought they did… Or, while the survivors try to rebuild the world that WICKED broke, they receive a surprise visit from an old friend. A Christmastime adventure ensues.

entry.title: Pulled Over and Pounded
entry.summary:
Author: Nightowl_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,314Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 33

Summary: The flash of red and blue in his rearview mirror made Derek Hale's stomach drop. "Shit," he muttered, slamming a hand against the steering wheel of his black Camaro. He'd had one too many at the bar, just enough to feel warm and loose, and now he was running late to meet his boyfriend Jackson for dinner. One more ticket would absolutely mean a suspended license. Or the one when Derek Hale gets pulled over for speeding on a lonely Beacon Hills backroad, he's desperate to avoid another ticket that could cost him his license. But Deputy Stiles Stilinski has other ideas that awaken Derek's hidden desires. Derek discovers a side of himself he never knew existed—leaving him forever changed.
